mapper.select: SELECT * ,count(re.review_id) as countreview FROM tb_newbee_mall_order_item as o join review as re on re.order_id = o.order_id left join review_like as rl on rl.review_id=re.review_id where o.goods_id= #{goodsId} AND proved=0 AND re.rating=#{rating} group by re.review_id order by rating DESC,countreview desc limit #{start},#{number}
